Manchester.WGIR (AM):
WGIR (610 AM; "News Radio 610") is a radio station in Manchester, New Hampshire with a news/talk format. The station is owned by iHeartMedia, Inc..


== History ==
WGIR signed on October 2, 1941 as WMUR, owned by former New Hampshire governor Francis P. Murphy and affiliated with the Blue Network and its successor, ABC Radio.
